Career

Home / Career/ Job Description

Front-End Developer (Intern)

Uttara, Dhaka

No. of Vacencies: 04

Fresher

We are looking for 4 Front-end Developer (Intern) with basic experience in HTML, CSS, SASS and Javascript. The intern will work directly with our WordPress Plugin and Theme Development Team.

What we do:

At Amana International, we work together to build creative themes and feature-rich plugins for WordPress users. We have achieved more than 4,00,000+ happy customers around the globe.

  • ThemeForest (Power Elite Author) – Amana International
  • ThemeForest (Power Elite Author) – Amana International
  • ThemeForest (Power Elite Author) – Amana International
  • ThemeForest (Power Elite Author) – Amana International
  • ThemeForest (Power Elite Author) – Amana International

Job Responsibility

  • Ability to Code PSD/Image to HTML Is a plus
  • Basic knowledge with CSS Preprocessing (SASS or LESS)
  • Basic knowledge in Javascript
  • Expertise in developing and testing across multiple browsers, platforms, and devices.
  • Proficiency with pixel-perfect design production.

Additional Requirement

  • Ability to Code PSD/Image to HTML Is a plus
  • Basic knowledge with CSS Preprocessing (SASS or LESS)
  • Basic knowledge in Javascript
  • Expertise in developing and testing across multiple browsers, platforms, and devices.
  • Proficiency with pixel-perfect design production.

Salary

  • Gross 10,000 BDT per month.

Benefits you will get

  • After successful completion of the internship, we may invite you as a regular team member in our company, based on your performance.
  • Training and learning materials to improve skills.
  • Lunch and Snacks will be provided from the office.
  • Team Buffet & Office pizza party
  • Other facilities as per company policy

Application Deadline: 23/03/2021

Read Before Apply

Please mention your expected salary in the cover letter.

Send your CV to amanaint@gmail.com
